channel.title: Whirlwind Wheelchair
channel.description: A non-profit social enterprise dedicated to improving the lives of people with disabilities in the developing world while also promoting sustainable local economic development

item.title: RoughRider Technical Support Pages Launched!
item.dc:creator: Israel Curtis
item.description: Have a technical support question about your RoughRider? Now it’s easy to find. Whirlwind Wheelchair just launched our RoughRider Technical Support pages. We’ve started with the basics – assembly and adjustment – but will be adding more; so check back and let us know if there is something you would like us to include.
item.content:encoded: Have a technical support question about your RoughRider? Now it’s easy to find.  Whirlwind Wheelchair just launched our RoughRider Technical Support pages.  We’ve started with the basics – assembly and adjustment – but will be adding more; so check back and let us know if there is something you would like us to include.
